website_summaries.verdict: The Huawei P8 Lite's affordable unlocked price is compelling, but the Alcatel OneTouch Idol 3 is a much better deal.
pros: The Huawei P8 Lite has a low price, a lightweight design, a sharp camera and dual-SIM capabilities
cons: The handset runs the rather dated Android KitKat OS, and its camera settings don't rotate when the phone is held in landscape mode

customer_reviews.title: SELLER AND PHONE USELESS
customer_reviews.text: This phone and the seller are USELESS! I've used it OK only for 2-3 weeks and then it started failing with the internet access, no matter what I did it never worked again. Since I bought the international version, I used in Peru, Southamerica, and now that I will get to send it back to the US where I bought it, the seller won't accept it or return any money nor offer a solution like changing it for another cellphone of the same price. Worst experience ever, I should have bought through E-BAY, they always guarantee customer satisfaction!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Not Working
customer_reviews.text: Wireless connection for this phone died unexpectedly after 5 months. Factory reset/ multiple Google tricks and no way to get it working again. By wireless connection I mean phone normal capability to connect to any wireless signal. 4G keeps working well.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban MC

customer_reviews.title: Great but Android upgrade is a real issue
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone, terrible upgrade support - Get a Moto G much better support for recent android version
customer_reviews.author: barletta

customer_reviews.title: Pros: price, performance, look, color (gold) ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: price, performance, look, color (gold); Cons: LCD screen not as bright as AMLED, 720P (not 1080P), small battery. Also the black bezel around the screen is quite large.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepy Guy

customer_reviews.title: This phone sucks. I want my money back .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my moher as a gift. What a shame. I can't even hear her well, the camera is not clear. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Lacombe

customer_reviews.title: Different model of phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone was not ALE-L02 model like the title of the order said, the model is ALE-021... but it works for me too...
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: this model. for sure has a wifi connect problem after several months. it just stops working, all u get is access denied and saved, doesnt matter what u do, u cant connect
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent mobile phone. excellent seller. deliver on the date set. thanks ahead
customer_reviews.author: PEDRO JAVIER BALMORI SANTANDER

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my girlfriend & she absolutely loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend & she absolutely loves it. She said the speaker isn't that loud but she still loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I recived anothder model ALE-L23 not A02 my country not working . It was terrible. Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint. Make sure your carrier supports these bands:
Cellular bands: GSM850, GSM900, GSM1800, GSM1900, UMTS850 (B5), UMTS1900 (B2), UMTS2100 (B1), LTE2100 (B1), LTE850 (B5), LTE1800 (B3), LTE2600 (B7)
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
